targets.expr: ((((sum(kube_daemonset_status_desired_number_scheduled{daemonset=~"^.*$app_name.*$"}) or vector(0))) - (sum(kube_daemonset_status_number_ready{daemonset=~"^.*$app_name.*$"}) or vector(0)))/ (sum(kube_daemonset_status_desired_number_scheduled{daemonset=~"^.*$app_name.*$"}) or vector(0))) * 100

panels.title: Log Size Flow Rate by pod
